description.summary: Protocol for requesting fractional surface scales

request.name: destroy
request.description: Informs the server that the client will not be using this protocol object anymore. This does not affect any other objects, wp_fractional_scale_wrath_v1 objects included.

entry.name: fractional_scale_exists
entry.summary: the output already has a fractional_scale object associated

request.name: get_fractional_scale

description.summary: extend output interface for scale information

request.description: Create an add-on object for the the wl_output to let the compositor notify fractional scales. If the given wl_output already has a wp_fractional_scale_v1 object associated, the fractional_scale_exists protocol error is raised.

arg.name: id
arg.summary: the new output scale info interface id

interface.name: wp_fractional_scale_wrath_v1

description.summary: fractional scale interface to a wl_output

interface.description: An additional interface to a wl_output object which allows the compositor to inform the client of the scale.

request.name: destroy

description.summary: remove output scale information for output

request.description: The associated wl_output's fractional scale object is destroyed.

event.name: scale_fractional
event.description: Notification of a new scale value for this output that the compositor suggests that the client should use.
